title: Frontpage update
scope: Update frontpage hero, messaging, and call-to-action in the Vite React frontend.
Ensure frontpage layout and styling are responsive across mobile and desktop.
acceptance_criteria: Frontpage hero copy, CTA, and supporting sections are updated per approved requirements.
Frontpage renders correctly on mobile and desktop breakpoints without layout regressions.
No new frontend lint or build errors are introduced.
risk_notes: Unintended visual regressions on the landing page.
CTA routing or copy mismatches with product messaging.
rollback_plan: Revert frontpage component and style changes to the previous working state.
